title: Version 1.3 reports IOException when re-creating an index
description:
Version: Lucene 1.3 final 
Error reported when I am (re-)doing an initialization on the index created 
previously:
java.io.IOException: couldn't delete _26a.f1

The problem disappearred after a re-start of the jvm, some files may be locked 
after the index writer action !
Problem does not appear in Version 1.2.

comments.content:
Please give the latest 1.4 Release Candidate a try.  You problem may already be
fixed in the the latest code.
comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic

comments.content: No reply, so let's assume it's fixed in 1.4.
